analysis.description:
DOCKCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xf88514091995fcd0abf7fa8865492825bfdbd69a.sol#297-315) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenPoolAddress,beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xf88514091995fcd0abf7fa8865492825bfdbd69a.sol#309-313)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xf88514091995fcd0abf7fa8865492825bfdbd69a.sol#33)
